page.title: 14BASSINGBOURN'S ANNUAL EVENTS
page.content:
{Month Event Organiser Place SEPT CH. FETE VICAR MANOR FM NOV CRAFT FAIR P.T.A INFANTS NOV BONFIRE FOB/PTA COL/JUN DEC WASSAIL P.T.A VILLAGE MARCH C.A PLAYS SCHOOL JUNIORS JUNE FETE P.T.A JUNIORS JULY SUM.SCHOOL F.O.B COL/JUN
Christian Aid Plays raise money for areas that suffer.i.e.Ethiopia. All the school take part in a play on their project. We raise about Â£60 over the two days we perform. Summer school is held in the first week of the holidays. The events range from computing to survival swimming. You have lessons each day in subjects of your choice. You pay Â£4.00 for 1 session & Â£7.00 for 2 sessions a week. There are 27 choices in 2 sessions.
